Articles.Content: Hello. I'm a fairly new player to KSP. I joined in 0.24 and have been loving every minute of this game. I saw you guys are a few days from release and figured I'd make a forum account. Argh, I be here to pillage and plunder designs (I'm joking of course)
Erm... The HypePlane is not really in service this update. The HypeTrain is at super speeds right now, so it will surely be more than enough!

Welcome!

Consider yourself one of usÃ¢â‚¬â€œ *we* are a few days away from 1.0

U HYPED?

![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

> 
> Super hype mode
> ACTIVATED

Sounds so much better when read in a turret voice. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Welcome aboard!

Welcome! Just in time to hype like the 27th is the first day of the rest of your life! Woo Woo party at my house!

if only I actually had KSP friends so I could really have a release party... ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

#HYPEISREAL Welcome to the forums! #MOREHYPE!

If you haven't already - head over to Live from Mission Control for a bunch of let's plays and other videos of KSP!

#LUDICROUSSPEED
Also, don't forget to drop in the HYPE Thread. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Welcome to the forums! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

The Hype Train is indeed pulling into the station soon. Enjoy the ride! Just don't forget your ticket.

> Erm... The HypePlane is not really in service this update.

I'd assume the new aero changes caused a partial disassembly in the upper atmosphere?
